value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. We don’t need to open the Power BI Desktop for the same. This new feature is being rolled out from December 2020 Power BI

value.title: Show/Hide Multiple Data Values using TME AG Toggle Switch – Custom Visual – Toggle Switch by TME AG

value.title: Sort a table using Multiple Columns in Power BI | Multi Column Sort in Power  BI
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can sort a tale using multiple columns for the table visualization in Power BI.  This feature has been rolled out in March 2020 Power BI Desktop Update.  Here, first we will learn how we can create apply a sort for the multiple column. Then we will change the sort
